member.name: MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_SINK_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies a type of capture sink.

member.name: MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_SINK_TYPE.MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_SINK_TYPE_RECORD
member.summary: A recording sink, for capturing audio and video to a file.

member.name: MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_SINK_TYPE.MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_SINK_TYPE_PREVIEW
member.summary: A preview sink, for previewing live audio or video.

member.name: MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_SINK_TYPE.MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_SINK_TYPE_PHOTO
member.summary: A photo sink, for capturing still images.
